tests.name: Topology1.Forwarding
tests.setup: mkdir -p build && if [  ! -d "test_remote/"  ]; then (git clone https://github.com/N2Sys-EDU/lab4-test test_remote && cd test_remote && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make && cd ../.. && cp ./test_remote/liblab4runtime.a build && cp ./test_remote/build/lab4_test build) fi && cd build && cmake .. && make
